initial_reviews.review_title: Great experience for the first year
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
We have been using Spotler since August 2022. Before that the onboarding process was pretty smooth. We're really getting to know the systems (pure360 and Squeezely) well and taking things slowly to make sure we learn as much as we can about the various elements. The power of the tools, i.e. the things they help us do, is absolutely awesome.  And our CSR, Kristian, is the best. We still have weekly calls with him to talk about the ways we are currently using the tools, and brainstorm ideas for the future.

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
There are a few small things that make using Spotler a challenge. We'd like to see an integration between our ERP and Spotler. So far we have to do the things we want manually. Additionally, Spotler looks at email marketing on a personal scale, using consumer data to carry on your email marketing programs to consumers. With our previous tool we had simply done bulk emails to large lists. We are transitioning our thinking from the old to the new.

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our email program has become much more robust and a bit more personalized. We want to become even more personalized, but the transition takes time. As we have become used to how pure360 and Squeezely work, we've become more efficient in email marketing. Additionally we have been able to personalize sections of our website using real-time data, resulting in increased revenue and engagement.

We still have weekly calls with him to talk about the ways we are currently using the tools, and brainstorm ideas for the future.

Additionally, Spotler looks at email marketing on a personal scale, using consumer data to carry on your email marketing programs to consumers. With our previous tool we had simply done bulk emails to large lists. We are transitioning our thinking from the old to the new.

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?

Additionally we have been able to personalize sections of our website using real-time data, resulting in increased revenue and engagement.

Also be able to add more emojis in the email without having to copy & paste them all the time.

all_reviews.review_title: Spotler has improved the way we handle our B2B Leads
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
Spotler has massively improved the way we handle our B2B leads - before, we had to do many things manually with limited information available to help the Sales team understand the leads and their behavior. We love that we can openly see the interactions and the follow-up actions through Gator Leads. We anticipate the data can only improve the more we use Spotler and look forward to seeing the measurable results. The onboarding process guide you though every step of the way!

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
The only real downside is that it is not as user friendly as some packages, however it is not so complicated its difficult to pick up. The benefits you receive for using Spotler over multiple packages or more expensive software suites far outweigh the negatives for us. The helpful onboarding team were always available as well to help out if you needed it!

Recommendations to others considering Spotler Mail+:
As long as you have a decent level of understanding flow charts and how different modules interact then I would highly recommend - it just isn't a basic beginner software!

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being B2B we needed something that gives tangible evidence of conversion rather than manually sifting through click-through reports. Spotler does this but much more - with us being able to follow a lead through Gator Leads and nurture through Gator Mail, we are finding it much easier to be more targetted in our approach - whether that is a prospect lead or an existing customer we are working with to grow. The reporting allows our Sales team to get real time feedback if a lead is doing something they need to be alert of - whether that is clicking a hot link on an email, visiting a flagged page on our website or filling in a form on a landing page. Spotler does it all in one suite and we can see the data improving over time which is great.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic at what they do
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
Quite simply, everything seems to work and when it doesn't their support team are lightning fast at getting back to you.

The drag and drop email builder has been a handy tool for developing templates whilst the HTML option provides scope for editing emails even further.

As a platform it has seamless integration with many of our other platforms and I can't say we've ever encountered an issue which has caused a campaign to become affected.

For those not wanting to invest heavily in email this is a fantastic tool. You can let the system choose the best subject heading, the drag and drop is incredibly simple and setting up the campaigns beyond that is even easier.

For those wanting to invest heavily the platform does what it sets out to do, send emails. Whether you use the aforementioned drag and drop builder or you go down the HTML route there is very little that P360 doesn't perform well with.

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
I have one single gripe. reporting - If, as a company, we weren't already onboard with the Pure intelligence platform I'd have a hard time getting the statistics I need outside of your standard OR, CTR, Bounce, Opt in/out, etc.

For those wanting to invest more time into understanding their emails, this will cause an issue in the short term - especially if you're looking to really dig into what is and what isn't working within the emails. (ie subject headings - those being split A/B tested can't be reported on unless two separate emails and journeys are created).

You can look into your emails well enough, there are heat maps, CTR statistics and a whole host more information into how a particular email has performed which is great!

But when you're looking to find out more information regarding a campaign's performance that's when things can get a little more difficult.

Recommendations to others considering Spotler Mail+:
It's well rounded, dependable and supports both HTML & the drag and drop format meaning it's easy to use for everyone.

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?
It solves the majority of our email woes - with the exception of reporting. Whether I need to send out a same-day email or build a sophisticated email P360 allows me to do both with a little know how into the product.

Occasionally, I've found that I can't save my email straight away - but that is just your average tech issue that you'd get with any company. So it's not something I dislike, just an occasional frustration - but something that happens very rarely!

Using subject line selector, you'll be able to test subject lines, maximising your chances of getting into recipients inboxes!

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent product to grow subscriber base
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
We have multiple campaigns running from multiple accounts, and no email calendar year is the same as the next. Not sure any other product could handle that as well as Pure360 does.
The product is great, the new HTML builder is smart, and the delivery tester is very reliable. I like the reporting which not only provides detailed insights but also gives us a general overview.
The segmentation tool is better than other products I've used. Because of this, it's great for Marketing Automation-based campaigns and useful for collecting/updating preferences from subscribers.
The support service is one of the best I've experienced, and the personal touch with account managers has been beneficial; sometimes I've been able to get quick changes implemented sooner, and this is priceless. They are also very patient and accommodating whatever situation arises.
The free seminars with learnings and recommendations are very handy and it's a great way to meet the team.

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
Dislike's a bit of a strong term, but the one thing that would help is if they had a larger tech and design team. They have a great team at the moment and do wonders with what they have, but more tech would be beneficial. The other is reporting on automated content; I think there are some limitations related to this that require a more bespoke package which comes at an extra cost.

Recommendations to others considering Spotler Mail+:
It works, especially for complex annual email programmes. If you've got MA-based campaigns then I would certainly recommend them, as I feel their segmentation options are great.  But we also use them for simple emails. From a delivery point of view, it's Intelligent Time Send function is very useful for large campaigns.

We don't have an API connecting Pure to our database, because it's old, but newer databases will be able to develop one with Pure360, which would make a huge difference.

The pricing packages work for us, and there's something not just for big corporates, but also for the smaller charities. I would certainly recommend using Pure360, especially if you're looking into MA-based campaigns.

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's helps with MA-based campaigns and collecting subscriber preferences, the main reporting functions provides valuable insights when presenting to directors. The ability to send out automated emails has also brought in benefits from a fundraising perspective.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
The best thing about Communigator against market alternatives has to be the simple and intuitiveness of the platform. (And if it's not simple they have one of the best support teams I have experienced working with) I am able to build campaigns in a very short space of time, from uploading the audience, to creating the email, to distribution the whole process is incredibly quick. Yet, whilst it's so simple, this is not done at the expense of functionality. Communigator is jam packed with functionality, allowing you to create dynamic emails, manipulate groups, build web capture forms... There's so much you can do

In terms of building automated campaigns within Communigator, this again is achieved in a simple manner. I am able to set up trigger based campaigns that are designed to nurture and segment our prospects. This allows us to do 2 things:

1 - We can segment our audience according to similar interests. For example more recently we have been distributing a newsletter and we monitor, which articles the audience are interested in. all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spotler Mail+?
As a Marketing Manager with no HTML skills, CommuniGator enables me to create best practice emailshots to promote our company's portfolio of products and services, ensuring maximum effectiveness.

The marketing automation functionality is an excellent way to nurture warm interests/people viewing pages on your website using marketing collateral such as white papers, solution overviews, case studies, webex invitations to educate the end user, and build your company's credentials at the same time.

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
CommuniGator is continually improving and looking for new and effective ways to enhance the functionality of the email marketing tool.  If i was being really picky, I'd say that it would be useful if you could hyperlink words in the text based emails (like you can with the HTML emails) as the long url links that are used under a text sentence, do not receive as many click throughs (I think they look dubious to an end user). Sorry.

What problems is Spotler Mail+ solving and how is that benefiting you?
The 'go to market' bottle neck in terms of my time.  There never seems to be enough hours in the day to strategically plan multiple campaigns with multiple vendors and tactically deliver marketing campaigns, and yet the campaigns still have to be created and out the door on time.  I now use CommuniGator's Managed Service which works really well. CommuniGator createsthe emailshots and builds the automated trigger campaigns with all the correct tracking measures in place.  With the reporting that CommuniGator provides, it  allows me to focus my attention on the strategic planning, digital marketing and working with the Telemarketing team.

We particularly like the ability to be able to set and attribute lead scoring capabilities so that our sales teams know how to prioritise their targets.  We also love the fact that the ability to setup automated trigger responses based on prospect behaviour is so easy to do.  We have seen an increase in our direct sales as a result of using Communigator, and having had difficulties in maximising value from other MA vendor solutions previously, I would definitely recommend the Communigator offering.

While we are able to change the branding on the UI, I sometimes I do think it would be nicer to be able to fully skin the interface to exactly match our branding so that it is completely consistent.  This is a nice to have though and obviously doesn't detract from usability

We had sent ad hoc emails to customers previously, but we didn't have a structured campaign programme that we ran to really engage our customers and act effectively on triggers that indicated they were engaged with our product. It took us some time to define the model by which we send our emails and the content within each, but the Communigator team were on hand to guide us throughout

*         Drastic increase in click through
*         Increasing qualified leads over time
*         Reduction in blacklisting
*         Greater insights into our prospect and customer behaviour
*         Greater knowledge to fuel the behaviour of our sales and account management teams

WOW's ability to identify contact-level details of web visitors ensures you know which companies have a degree of interest in what your company does, and this makes the initial approach so much easier. In addition to the product itself, the support team at Communigator is excellent.

What do you dislike about Spotler Mail+?
It is difficult to find fault with Communigator when compared to other similar products.

I see regular email communication as an excellent method to both attract new customers and maintain the attention (and hopefully retention!) of existing ones.
